overview: D.O. is a porn legend admired throughout the industry, but it wasn’t until he performed for Lucas Entertainment that he bottomed for the first time on camera! The D.O. Collection highlights not only D.O.’s ability to fuck like a champion, but also his talent for bending over and taking a cock with the best of them. title: THE D.O. COLLECTION
